PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE 
	{ 	?s ?p ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?s ?p ?literal }
WHERE
	{ 	?s ?p ?o .
		VALUES (?p) {
			( dcterms:title )
			( dcterms:description )
			( dcterms:spatial )
			( dcat:keyword )
			( dcat:theme )
		}
		FILTER ( isLiteral(?o) && langMatches(lang(?o), ""))
		BIND ( STRLANG(?o, "fr") as ?literal)
	}
